com.android.layoutlib.bridge.android

Class BridgeWindowSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.android.layoutlib.bridge.android.BridgeWindowSession

  • public final class BridgeWindowSession
extends java.lang.Object
    Implementation of IWindowSession so that mSession is not null in the SurfaceView.
